document.full_text: flames shot up and a loud boom was heard on monday as the u.s. government blew a hole in a mississippi river flood levee in a bid to save several towns in illinois and kentucky from being inundated.
document.title: u.s. blows up flood levee on mississippi river
lines_and_colors: flames shot up and a loud boom was heard on monday as the u.s. government blew a hole in a mississippi river flood levee in a bid to save several towns in illinois and kentucky from being inundated.
